name: Pequot Hotel B and B

reviews.title: Wonderful B + B with working fireplace
reviews.text: Nancy and Jim are great Innkeepers. Our room had a working fireplace, and the house is a restored 1840 home.

reviews.title: A treasured spot
reviews.text: They spent 12 years rebuilding the house themselves, and you can really tell they did a great job. Besides the bathrooms, the entire house was restored to original form.
Of course, it has all the modern features that one is used to.
reviews.title: a quaint qiuet place just mins from the casinos

description: The Pequot Hotel was built in 1840 as a stagecoach stop and a meeting place for the Freemasons. It has operated as a Bed and Breakfast since 1991. It is located about 2.5 miles from Historic Downtown Mystic, Mystic Seaport Museum and Mystic Aquarium. The three lovely guestrooms are furnished with family heirlooms and antiques and all rooms have private modern bathrooms. The large screened porch is a perfect place to relax on a summer evening or to take an early cup of coffee in the morning. A large parlor with television is available for guests, and Internet access is free. All of the guest rooms have A/C in the summer, and two rooms have working fireplaces for use in the winter.We welcome children over the age of eight years, but do not allow smoking or pets. We have a dog, a Basenji, Haley, for your amusement.
